app_name: Photo & Video Downloader for Instagram - Repost IG
app_detail:
Wanna download HD photos or videos from Instagram and IGTV? Looking for an app that can easily download or repost Instagram images and videos without logging in ? Then this Insta download and Insta repost app is definitely what you want!

Photo & Video Downloader for Instagram and Repost Instagram app (also known as InsTake Downloader) can help you save Instagram photos and videos in simple steps. It is super fastğŸš€ and 100% free. 

Imagine you are on the feed of Instagram and interested in a photo or video, you want to save the photo or video and review offline , or share with friends, or repost to Instagram or other social medias. Then how?

With another ig download app or ig repost app, you must login Instagram in their app then scroll to the video or photo while your feed is updated continuously. It's complicated and such a waste of time, and sometimes you find it unsafe to login Instagram in a third-party app. 

With Video Downloader for Instagram and Repost Instagram App, You donâ€™t need to login. Just copy link or share link of the post and then the download will automatically start. It is super easy and fast. You can easily download ig photos and ig videos to your Android device. This way, you can enjoy downloaded ig photos and ig videos anytime, or share with others. You can also easily copy hashtags and captions for repost.

So install this Video Download for Instagram and Repost app and try nowï¼

How to Use :
There are 2 methods to download: 
1. Use â€˜Share Linkâ€™
Step 1: Open Instagram and click on the "Share Link" of the photo or video you are interested in.
Step 2: Select Video Download for Instagram and Repost(InsTake Downloader) to share
Done! The Instagram photo or video will be downloaded automatically 

2. Use â€˜Copy Linkâ€™
Step 1: Open Instagram and click on the "Copy Link" of the Instagram photo or video you are interested in.
Step 2: Open Video Download for Instagram and Repost(InsTake Downloader)
Done! The Instagram photo or video will be downloaded automatically 

Features:
- No login required
- Free video downloader and repost for Instagram and IGTV. Save instagram photos and media clips. Great Instagram image saver and Instagram video saver.
- Super fast save instagram videos and photos
- Support all HD video and photo downloads 
- Play videos offline with the built-in video player
- Review photos offline with the built-in album
- Support copy link, share, rename, repost for the downloaded photos or videos
- Support copy hashtag and caption, easy for reposting
- Small size and lightweight

Video Downloader for Instagram and Repost app (InsTake Downloader) is a dedicated instagram video saver and Insta photo saver to download all videos and images from Instagram feeds and IGTV. With easy steps, you can download Instagram images and Instagram videos to your device and save Insta photos and Insta videos as long as you want. The versatile design of the download page makes it easy to manage downloaded Insta images and ig videos, share Instagram videos and photos with friends, or repost to Instagram or other social media.

Video Downloader for Instagram supports super download mode which can boost your download speed up to 3 times faster than other downloaders with its multi-thread tech.

The built-in video player can play all the Instagram videos you downloaded.

So it is really a good download tool for Instagram deserves to be installed and try

Notes:
- Video Downloader for Instagram and repost (InsTake Downloader) it is not affiliated with Instagram. It is a tool for Instagram photo and video download.
- We respect the copyright of the owners. So DO NOT download or repost the videos and media clips without ownersâ€™ permission.
